snippet.title: Antibody Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are very proud to officially announce our second game Antibody! This shoot ‘em up is a spiritual successor to Williams’ 1981 arcade hit Defender and offers a delicate balance between strategy and agility.

Wishlist Antibody now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1474480/Antibody/

Learn more by visiting our website at:
https://punchbuttonstudios.com/
